3.2: All is forgiven by the Heikaeser, for just as he knows all, he also forgets all, and he forgets to punish that which he forgets happened.

6.7: And remember, my loyal subjects, the long forgotten eighth day of creation,
6.8: when after the Sky Daddy had created everything, in His divinity He righteously named them all,
6.9: and from that day on, all was one:
